request.title: Logging Parcel Schema
request.description: Logging profile parcel schema for POST request

diskFileSize.description: Set maximum size of file before it is rotated

diskFileRotate.description: Set number of syslog files to create before discarding oldest files

profile.description: Specify the name of the TLS profile

name.description: Set hostname or IPv4 address of server

vpn.description: Set hostname or IPv4 address of server

sourceInterface.description: Set interface to use to reach syslog server

priority.description: Set logging level for messages logged to server

ipv6Server.description: Enable logging to remote ipv6 server

name.description: Set IPv6 hostname or IPv6 address of server

vpn.description: Set hostname or IPv4 address of server

sourceInterface.description: Set interface to use to reach syslog server

priority.description: Set logging level for messages logged to server

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for Logging profile parcel
